atg.payment.creditcard
Interface CreditCardStatus

All Superinterfaces:
PaymentStatus, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AuthorizationAddressVerificationStatus, CreditCardStatusImpl, CyberCashStatus, PayFlowProStatus
public interface CreditCardStatus
extends PaymentStatus

This class defines a credit card payment transaction status. It encapsulates basic transaction information returned from a credit card payment system.
